Swift Views¶

swift.views.locality_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

Shows the nodes where the account/container/object is stored. In the case that the account/container/object does not exist, return the nodes where it will be save.

swift.views.sort_detail(*args, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve, update or delete a Proxy Sorting.

swift.views.sort_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

List all proxy sortings, or create a proxy sortings.

swift.views.storage_policies(*args, **kwargs)¶

Creates a storage policy to swift with an specific ring. Allows create replication storage policies and erasure code storage policies

swift.views.storage_policy_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

List all storage policies.

swift.views.tenants_list(*args, **kwargs)¶

List swift tenants.
